snippet: Browns linebacker Scott Fujita accused N.F. L. Commissioner Roger Goodell of misusing his power, questioned his record on player safety and vowed to keep fighting to clear his name.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Cleveland Browns linebacker Scott Fujita, angered by NFL commissioner Roger Goodell's handling of the New Orleans Saints bounty scandal, accuses Goodell of misusing his power, questions his record on player safety and vows to keep fighting to clear his name; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Browns linebacker Scott Fujita accused N.F. L. Commissioner Roger Goodell of misusing his power, questioned his record on player safety and vowed to keep fighting to clear his name.

headline.seo: Scott Fujita, Player in Bounty Scandal, Fires Back at Goodell
headline.main: Player in Bounty Scandal Fires Back at Goodell
headline.print_headline: Player in Bounty Scandal Fires Back at Goodell
